actions.name: Surge Surfer
actions.description: Effect: If a space within range possesses Electric Terrain, the user is affected by Electric Terrain.

actions.name: Surge Surfer
actions.description: Effect: While Electric Terrain is active the user's SPD stat is increased by 50% and the user has +2 default SPD Stages.

system.description: Effect: While Electric Terrain is active the user's SPD stat is increased by 50% and the user has +2 default SPD Stages.
